identity.name: Right Doers World
identity.archetype: Electric & Neon (Future, Speed) mixed with Indian Vibrancy
identity.target_audience: Gen Z (Insta generation), Blue & White Collar, India-centric

headings.usage: All section headers, hero text, and major calls to action. Use 'Clash Display' from CDN or local font files. If unavailable, fallback to 'Syne'.

body.usage: All paragraph text, UI labels, inputs, and data displays. Chosen for its geometric clarity and modern feel.

mono.usage: Code snippets, ID numbers (DoersID), and technical data.

primary.description: Electric Indigo - Represents Wisdom, Tech, and the 'Right' path.

secondary.description: Signal Orange - Represents Action, Urgency (Blinkit-style), and Energy.

accent.description: Success Green - Used for 'Hired', 'Verified', and Money.

background.description: Off-white for day (clarity), Void Black for night (immersion).

grid_system.marketing: Tetris Grid (Mode A) - Asymmetrical, dynamic, breaking the monotony.
grid_system.dashboard: Bento Grid (Mode B) - Dense, data-rich, every pixel utilized.

spacing.scale: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for containers. Gap-4 for tight data, Gap-8 for layout sections.
spacing.mobile_safe_area: Ensure pb-20 for bottom navigation visibility.

containers.card_style: Neo-Brutalist Soft. Rounded-xl, 1px border, subtle shadow-sm. Hover: shadow-md + scale-[1.01].
containers.glass: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/70 (light) or bg-black/60 (dark) with border-white/20.

buttons.primary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-primary text-white font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-primary/25 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: h-12 px-8 rounded-full bg-secondary text-white font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-secondary/25 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: h-10 px-4 rounded-lg hover:bg-accent/10 hover:text-accent font-medium

inputs.style: h-12 rounded-lg border-2 border-slate-200 focus:border-primary focus:ring-0 bg-slate-50 transition-colors
inputs.otp: Large, centered, individual boxes. Auto-focus next.

cards.job_card: Border-l-4 border-l-primary bg-card p-4 rounded-r-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all
cards.doer_card: Profile image left, stats right. 'Hired' badge absolute top-right.

navigation.mobile_bottom_bar: Fixed bottom, 5 items (Home, Jobs, AIMEE, Wallet, Profile). Active state: Filled icon + Label. Inactive: Outline icon.
navigation.desktop_sidebar: Collapsible, icon-only mode for more content space.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to prevent 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone) for UI. 3D Badges for Gamification.
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Buttons click (scale down). Lists stagger in. Modals slide up from bottom (mobile).
visual_enhancers.confetti: Trigger confetti on 'Job Applied' or 'Profile Complete'.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is APCA compliant. Use text-slate-900 on light backgrounds, text-slate-50 on dark.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the CDN links for Clash Display and Manrope to the index.html head immediately.
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Electric India' colors and font families.
3. MOBILE FIRST: Build the Mobile PWA view first. The desktop view is secondary.
4. GAMIFY: Use the 3D badge images in the 'Talent Clubs' section. Make them pop.
5. AIMEE CHAT: Build the AI Assistant page to look like a modern chat app (WhatsApp/Telegram) but with 'Job Cards' inside the chat.
6. QR CODE: The landing page MUST feature a prominent QR code scanner or display for the 'Shop GTM' strategy.
7. DO NOT use generic 'Lorem Ipsum'. Use realistic Indian names (Aarav, Diya, Arjun) and job titles (Data Entry, Delivery Partner, Java Developer).
8. USE SONNER: Replace default toasts with 'sonner' for better aesthetics.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  for icons. Use Lucide or Phosphor icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
All interactive elements MUST include 'data-testid' attribute.
